title: Coconut curry butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, halved and seeded', '1 tablespoon butter, melted', '1 teaspoon salt, divided', '3/4 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, divided (see note)', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon butter', '85g chopped yellow onion', '1 teaspoon yellow curry powder', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '600ml vegetable stock, or more if needed', '1/4 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '70g pumpkin seeds', '1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg, or to taste']
